topic.title: Examples for Creating External Tables
topic.shortdesc: These examples show how to define external data with different protocols. Each CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE command can contain only one protocol.

body.note: When using IPv6, always enclose the numeric IP addresses in square brackets.
body.p: Start gpfdist before you create external tables with the gpfdist protocol. The following code starts the gpfdist file server program in the background on port 8081 serving files from directory /var/data/staging. The logs are saved in /home/gpadmin/log.
